author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower flood testing tips…I finished waterproofing my client’s shower but I have to flood test it. I use an Oatey 4” Gripoer Plug in the drain and mark the wall with a Pica Dry wet jet pencil. Then I use a SharkBite washing machine angle valve to fill the shower with water. I wait 24 hours, look for leaks and inspect the water mark. After passing the flood testing I start tile work. For more shower renovation tips and full step by step courses visit homerepairtutor.com 🔥#showerremodel #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Schluter Shower Flood Testing Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #showerremodel #homerepairtutor
